description: Checkpoint position with knee on opponent's stomach forcing reactions worth 2 points IBJJF
key_points: Knee on solar plexus/stomach|Other leg posted wide for base|Pull weight down with grips|Stay light and mobile
common_mistakes: Knee too low|No base|Weight not pulling|Static position

description: Armbar attacking near arm when opponent pushes knee from knee on belly
key_points: When opponent pushes on knee|Control arm and step over|Sit back into armbar|Finish with hip extension
common_mistakes: Not controlling arm|Poor step over|Too much space|Slow transition

description: Collar choke from KOB using baseball bat grip and spinning motion
key_points: Four-fingers-in far collar|Thumb-in near collar|Baseball bat grip|Spin through to finish
common_mistakes: Grips not set|Wrong spin|Loose grips|Poor timing

description: Cross collar choke attacking from knee on belly position
key_points: Deep cross collar grips|Maintain KOB pressure|Pull elbows in|Squeeze to finish
common_mistakes: Grips not deep|Losing position|Elbows flaring|Not tight

description: Moving from knee on belly to full mount position
key_points: From KOB, slide knee across|Settle into mount|Maintain control|Establish mount grips

description: Taking the back when opponent turns away from knee on belly
key_points: When opponent turns away|Follow to back|Insert hooks|Establish seatbelt

description: Armbar on far arm by stepping over from knee on belly position
key_points: Control far arm|Step over with posted leg|Sit back into armbar|Finish with extension

description: Fundamental escape from knee on belly using hip escape and frames
key_points: Frame on knee and hip|Hip escape away|Insert knee|Recover guard or escape

description: Knee on belly facing opponent's legs for leg lock entries
key_points: Knee on belly facing legs|Control upper body|Legs threatening|Ready for leg attacks

description: Wrist lock when opponent defends from bottom of knee on belly
key_points: When opponent frames or grabs|Isolate wrist|Apply hyperflexion|Gradual pressure

description: Armbar by spinning around opponent's head from knee on belly
key_points: Control arm|Spin around head|Lock armbar position|Finish with extension
common_mistakes: Losing arm|Slow spin|Too much space|Poor control

description: Transitioning from knee on belly to S-mount for arm attacks
key_points: From KOB, slide into S-mount|Trap arm under leg|Secure position|Attack armbar

description: Using collar grip to drag opponent up and take back from KOB
key_points: From KOB, deep collar grip|Pull opponent up|Circle to back|Establish control
common_mistakes: Weak grip|Not pulling through|Losing position|Poor timing

description: Transitioning from knee on belly to north-south position
key_points: From KOB, walk toward head|Settle into north-south|Maintain pressure|Control with chest

description: Techniques to maintain knee on belly when opponent is escaping
key_points: Stay light and mobile|Follow opponent's movement|Switch sides if needed|Maintain grips
